creator: Digijeunes
title: Conductive Dough and Makey-Makey
description: This tutorial demonstrates how to create conductive dough and use it in conjunction with a Makey Makey to build interactive objects such as musical instruments and video game controllers.
steps: Mix water, 1 cup of flour, salt, cream of tartar, vegetable oil, and food coloring (optional) in a medium-sized pot.
Cook the mixture over medium heat, stirring continuously until a ball forms.
Place the dough ball on a lightly floured surface.
Slowly knead the remaining flour into the ball until the desired consistency is reached, being careful not to add too much flour.
Combine the conductive dough with the Makey Makey to create interactive items.
